title: Dukes of Madness
description: Two years of my life have been stolen by the Royals of Forsyth. Two years of captivity and hell. Two years at the whim of powerful men.I spent that time seeking freedom.Now I want nothing more than revenge.It won’t be easy. It’ll be painful and humiliating, but in the end taking down the thugs and thieves and criminals terrorizing Forsyth will be worth it.I just have to decide who to go after first.The Dukes of Madness is book 5 in the contemporary, dark romance, Royals of Forsyth U series by best-selling authors, Angel Lawson and Samantha Rue.Reading Order:Lords of PainLords of WrathLords of MercyDukes of RuinDukes of MadnessDukes of Peril
author: Angel Lawson
